snippet.title: Arcanbreak Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402400/Arcanbreak/

Links: https://talehammer.carrd.co/ 
For Evelyn II: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2248960/For_Evelyn_II__Shards_of_Creation/ 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TaleHammer 
Twitter: https://x.com/Tale_Hammer

A short story-driven game about two Inquisitors, Arun and Quila, investigating a murder. During the game you'll control both, each having their own set of skills you'll need to solve the mystery.

Made with Unity, using Adventure Creator by Chris Burton
Music - Myuu thedarkpiano.com

Character Art - Visustella
Title Screen Art - Laura Kiesow
Map Graphics - Refmap
